Articles.Content:
I fully expect all of the mods to be broken for a couple of weeks after release.  BTW from what I've heard so far, the performance is amazing!

JR
It's downloading now. I can't wait! Time to start a new career...

Ok so I played the pre-release and I have to admit... Squad has really gone beyond the call of duty on this update.

It's got so many little nice touches in it that really enhance the game, I am amazed how much better the game is for it.

Aside from the massive performance boost for multi part ships, parts have more tweakable options, landing gear has been updated and now can ALL STEER and ALL HAVE LIGHTS. 

We can tweak engine pitch yaw roll settings. 

In cockpit overlay was something I scoffed at when it was revealed but I immediately retract that statement now because of what I THINK they will be doing with this feature in the future. To be able to see your crew INSIDE the crew pods is something I've been asking for since the beginning and now we have the seeds of that feature beginning to be implemented. 

New textures for ground, water etc. 

I still get lag when looking at Kerbin during launches etc BUT overall I'm very impressed. Now I can't wait to see what they do next (fingers crossed for audio/visual overhaul).
Please discuss 1.1 performance here in the pre-release branch.
